hooks.command: /mnt/c/_tools/toast64.exe --app-id "Claude code" --title "Claude Code Idle Prompt" --message "Your Claude Code session has been idle for a while. Need assistance?"
/mnt/c/_tools/toast64.exe --app-id "Claude code" --title "Claude Code Permission Prompt" --message "Claude Code requires your permission to proceed."
/mnt/c/_tools/toast64.exe --app-id "Claude code" --title "Claude Code Elicitation Dialog" --message "Claude Code is requesting additional information from you."

statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); remaining=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.remaining_percentage // empty'); [ -n "$remaining" ] && echo "$model | Context: $remaining% remaining" || echo "$model"
